chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
si: sorted_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
uii: unique_indices_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (net' : network), doLeader (nwState net h) h = (out, d, ms) -> logs_sorted net -> log_matching net -> uniqueIndices_host_invariant net -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (map (fun m : Net.name * Net.msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms)) -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = (if name_eq_dec h' h then d else nwState net h')) -> log_matching_nw net'

Premises:
log_matching_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> (forall (h :
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
pSrc = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (pSrc, _, _) := p in pSrc : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.name Arguments pSrc {P params}
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
doLeader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : raft_data) (me : name) => match type state with | Leader => let state' := advanceCommitIndex state me in if shouldSend state' then let state'0 := RaftState.set_raft_data_shouldSend term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state' false in let replicaMessages := map (replicaMessage state'0 me) (filter (fun h : name => if name_eq_dec me h then false else true) nodes)
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
log_matching = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => log_matching_hosts net /\ log_matching_nw net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_matching {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
uniqueIndices_host_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, uniqueIndices (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments uniqueIndices_host_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.name Arguments pDst {P params}
logs_sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => logs_sorted_host net /\ logs_sorted_nw net /\ packets_gt_prevIndex net /\ packets_ge_prevTerm net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_sorted {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Inductive raft_output (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := NotLeader : clientId -> nat -> raft_output | ClientResponse : clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output Arguments raft_output {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments NotLeader {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope Arguments ClientResponse {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
RIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader (nwState net h) h = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h (nwState net h) = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_do_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output)...
RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_invariant_handle_input : forall (P : network -> Prop) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
log_matching_state_same_packet_subset : forall net net' : network, log_matching net -> (forall h : Net.name, log (nwState net h) = log (nwState net' h)) -> (forall p : packet, is_append_entries (pBody p) -> In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> log_matching net'
raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
step_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l
step_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l
raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) -> pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt ->...
raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m)...
Build_sorted_interface : (forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')) ->...-> sorted_interface
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P n n0 l
raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res...
Inductive step_failure (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) : step_relation (list Net.name * network) (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {|...
RIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : Net.name) (ps : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) => map (fun m : Net.name * Net.msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), Net.name -> list (Net.name * Net.msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
raft_net_invariant_reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_reboot {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net ->...-> logs_sorted net } Arguments sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _)%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P n n0 l
